alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon River; Yukon Delta Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 2:15PM AKST until January 08 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Strong winds, snow and blowing snow expected with blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. Visibility could be less than one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Yukon Delta Coast and Lower Yukon River. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts could form.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Lower Yukon River; Yukon Delta Coast
